DOC.brief_title: Safety Tolerability Study PCI-32765 Combined With Fludarabine/Cyclophosphamide/Rituximab ( FCR ) Bendamustine/Rituximab ( BR ) Chronic Lymphocytic Leukemia ( CLL )
DOC.detailed_description: This Phase 1b , open-label , parallel-group , nonrandomized , multicenter study PCI 32765 420 mg daily oral ( PO ) administration combination 2 different chemotherapy regimens subject relapsed/refractory chronic lymphocytic leukemia ( CLL ) /small lymphocytic lymphoma ( SLL ) .
